name: COLD BREW ICED COFFEE
description: Cold brew iced coffee is a refreshing and smooth beverage made by steeping coffee grounds in cold water for an extended period, resulting in a less acidic and bitter taste compared to traditional hot brewed coffee.

description: Japanese iced coffee is a brewing method where hot coffee is brewed directly over ice, resulting in a clean and flavorful cup with a slightly chilled temperature.

name: FRESHLY SQUEEZED ORANGE JUICE

name: FRESHLY SQUEEZED GRAPEFRUIT JUICE

name: POUR OVER
